contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Dugongidae<ref name=MSW3>{{MSW3 Shoshani}}</ref> | image = Dugong Marsa Alam.jpg | A dugong in [[Marsa Alam]] | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Mammal]]ia | ordo = [[Sirenia]] | familia = '''Dugongidae''' | subdivision_ranks = Genera | subdivision = See text }} '''Dugongidae''' is a [[Family (biology)|family]] in the [[Order (biology)|order]] of [[Sirenia]]. The family has one surviving [[species]], the [[dugong]] (''Dugong dugon''), one recently [[Extinction|extinct]] species, the [[Steller's Sea Cow]] (''Hydrodamalis gigas''), and a number of extinct [[Genus|genera]] known from the [[fossil]] record. ==Taxonomy== * Family '''DUGONGIDAE''' ** Genus [[extinction|†]]''[[Anisosiren]]'' *** Species †''[[Anisosiren pannonica]]'' ** Genus †''[[Indosiren]]'' *** Species †''[[Indosiren javanensis]]'' *** Species †''[[Indosiren koeningswaldi]]'' ** Genus †''[[Miodugong]]'' *** Species †''[[Miodugong brevicranius]]'' ** Genus hungaricus]]'' ** Subfamily [[Dugong|Dugonginae]] *** Genus †''[[Bharatisiren]]'' **** Species †''[[Bharatisiren indica]]'' **** Species †''*** Genus †''[[Dioplotherium]]'' **** Species
